CustomField.description: This is the name of the product, without the number of Attorneys or Timekeepers. For example, if the name is "Time Builder - 100" the short name would be "Time Builder".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the name of the product, without the number of Attorneys or Timekeepers. For example, if the name is "Time Builder - 100" the short name would be "Time Builder".
CustomField.label: Product Short Name
